name: dressing_getSupportedCourses
description: This function is used to retrieve the list of clothing care courses available on a SmartThings air dresser.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to retrieve the supported courses.
